body.name: Melissa & Doug Magnetic Car Loader Wooden Toy Set With 4 Cars and 1 Semi-Trailer Truck - Crane Wooden Toy, Vehicle Toys For Kids Ages 3+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 6 hrs 16 mins
features: FUN ON THE MOVE: Geared for kids ages 3 to 6, this wooden vehicle set includes a red truck with magnetic arm, car-carrier trailer, and 4 magnetic cars.

HELPS DEVELOP MULTIPLE SKILLS: Featuring bright colors, the cars are numbered, inspiring counting, sorting, and sequencing. It’s a great toy for developing fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: The Melissa & Doug magnetic car loader is made from high-quality materials. The sturdy wooden vehicle set provides hours of loading and unloading screen-free play and learning.
GIFT FOR AGES 3 TO 6: The Melissa & Doug Magnetic Car Loader Wooden Toy Set makes an ideal gift for kids from 3 to 6 years of age. This set plays well with the Melissa & Doug Wooden Railway Set.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.”
body.description: Product Description This big red rig has a magnetic arm that can reach every car on its trailer! It's one terrific wooden vehicle set with so much to offer: Link up the trailer to the car carrier to take the four magnet-topped cars for a drive, then unload each one at its destination. Sort and sequence the wooden cars--each one has a distinct color, stripe, and number to inspire playful counting, sorting, and sequencing activities. Then load the cars again and roll out! Car- and truck-loving kids will love discovering endless play possibilities as they roll this wooden truck toy all around the house and to the ends of their imaginations. The tough vehicles have sturdy wooden chassis and smooth-rolling wheels, so they'll stand up to countless deliveries and road trips. And maneuvering the articulated arm is easy to do, great for fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination, and so much fun! Designed to engage playful preschoolers and young children, and constructed with care to withstand their harshest treatment, this play set is made of durable, child-safe materials and is safety-tested to our most rigorous standards. The variety and wealth of possibilities is sure to inspire countless imaginative adventures. The Melissa & Doug Magnetic Car Loader Wooden Toy Set makes an ideal gift for kids from 3 to 6 years of age. This set plays well with the Melissa & Doug Wooden Railway Set. The package measures 5.75" H x 13" W x 3" L and weighs 1.5 pounds. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play. Brand Story By From the Manufacturer From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential! See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Countless Ways to Play From classic wooden toys to realistic pretend play sets, Melissa & Doug products spark imagination and wonder through screen-free, open-ended play! We make well-crafted toys that are developed with care to be passed down from generation to generation or shared family to family. When kids pretend with Melissa & Doug, anything is possible!

Truck, Trailer & 4 Cars Includes red truck with magnetic arm, car-carrier trailer, and 4 magnetic wooden cars. Lift & Load This big red rig has a magnetic arm that can reach every car on its trailer! Detachable Trailer Detachable trailer features stabilizing tracks to keep cars in place while truck is in motion.

With more than three decades of experience, we’re a brand you can trust. Our safe and durable toys inspire imaginative play and are designed to stand the test of time and be passed down through generations. We use wood whenever we can because it’s renewable and durable. To ensure the world has healthy forests AND high-quality wooden toys, we’ve committed to planting 10 million trees by 2030. 100% Screen-Free No screens, no apps, just good wholesome toys for hours of kid-powered fun! Each one of our products is designed to engage children in the joy of imaginative, hands-on play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toy is absolutely adorable and very well made. It occupied the child for a long time. It’s very sweet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy as it’s made out of wood. Very easy for my two year old to understand how to work it. Great gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toy
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought two of these, one for each of Mt older boys. They love it! The magnets work great and it's very sturdy. Just be careful if you have very small children because of the circle magnets are on the outside and could be bitten off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this as a gift for our 2.5 year old nephew and he loved it. It kept him busy for 15-20 minutes which is great. Great toy from a quality brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only 'problem'is that the arm is not very maneuverable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a magnetic set. Good for the imagination. This toy is easy for little hands to grasp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality is great. The cars are a nice size the magnet is strong. My nephew and my son loved them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic and easy toy, nephew loves it
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use toy, very simple, nephew enjoys it.
We purchased this toy for our 2 1/2 yr old grandson for one of his Christmas gifts.He loves it. The great quality from Melissa and Doug and he got to learn about magnets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent quality, a lovely wooden toy
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for a two year old, excellent quality, magnets work well. A lovely wooden toy.

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality, durable and attractive toy for pretend play
reviews.reviewText: A sturdy, durable and attarctive toy for all the toddlers that love to play with vehicles. My toddler has used it over last couple of months almost everyday to rescue some or other vehicle that needs help in his imaginative play world. Picking and dropping cars helps in fine motor development. Highly satisfied with the quality and durability of the product.
Fue un regalo para mi sobrino y le encantó! Venia muy bien buena calidad y muy útil para motricidad fina

Likes: Well made, sturdy construction. 4 little numbered, different coloured cars... fun way to reinforce learning.Magnets work well for loading and unloading.Dislikes: Slightly hard for "just turned "3yo to get used to concept of folding crane jib between cars... but did get there! ( wouldnt go under the bridge until in place..lol)Many happy hours of play...often got out by choice amongst oither toys. Would definately buy again.
